About Me

As a PMP Project Manager at Hancock Ogundiya & Partners, I bring over a decade of experience in managing and executing complex civil and environmental engineering projects. With a Master's degree in Construction Management from the University of Lagos, coupled with extensive certifications in project management and data analysis, I am dedicated to driving successful project outcomes through a data-driven approach.
